app.containers.Admin.Insights.Edit.categ: As etiquetas são a forma de estruturar o seu contributo. Definir e atribuir etiquetas é o primeiro passo da sua análise, após o qual pode aprofundar o conteúdo dos posts ligados a cada etiqueta. As mensagens podem ter zero, uma ou várias etiquetas atribuídas.
{bold} para organizar e analisar os postos

app.containers.Admin.Insights.listDescri: Um insight é um resumo textual ou visual do input. É um ponto de partida para formular conclusões e um bloco de construção para relatórios. As acções aqui tomadas não têm impacto no resto da plataforma e não são visíveis para os participantes.

app.containers.AdminPage.DashboardPage.m: A classificação baseia-se no número de mensagens (5 pontos por mensagem), comentários (3 pontos por comentário) e votos (1 ponto por voto) apresentados por cada participante.

app.containers.AdminPage.DashboardPage.r: This base dataset is required to calculate the representativeness of platform users compared to the total population.
See how representative your platform users are compared to the total population - based on data collected during user registration. Learn more about {representativenessArticleLink}.
See how representative your platform users are compared to the total population - based on data collected during user registration.
None of the enabled registration fields are supported at the moment.
Here you can show/hide items on the dashboard and enter the base data. Only the enabled fields for {userRegistrationLink} will appear here.
app.containers.AdminPage.DashboardPage.s: Discover what's happening on your platform.
app.containers.AdminPage.FaviconPage.fav: Tips for choosing a favicon image: select a simple image, as the shown image size is very small. Your favicon should only be set once as changes will require some technical support.

In Beta: currently available in English, French, German, Portuguese and Spanish. Posts flagged as potentially containing inappropriate content will not be blocked, but will be highlighted for review on the {linkToActivityPage} page.

app.modules.commercial.analytics.admin.c: The number of users who have participated in one or more project(s). Participants for polling and embedded surveys will not be counted here.
Percentage of all participants compared to all visitors.
Projects that are not archived and visible on the 'Active' table on the home page
All archived projects and active timeline projects that have finished are counted here
The number of projects that are visible on the platform
Proposals that have reached the required voting threshold
Percentage of all registrations compared to all visitors.
Only users who have accepted cookie tracking will be counted. Admins and project managers are not counted.

When the project filter is active, this shows the average duration of any visit that included the selected project. This counts the entire period a user was on the platform, not just the time spent on the selected project page(s).

When the project filter is active, this shows the average page views for any visit that included the selected project. This counts all pages that a user viewed during the visit, not just the selected project page(s).
"Visitors" is the number of unique visitors. If a person visits the platform multiple times, they are only counted once.
"Visits" is the number of sessions. If a person visited the platform multiple times, each visit is counted.
To view the full list of referrers, {referrerListButton}
